function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Designing apartment buildings with access to natural ventilation and improved indoor air quality","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict data protection regulations and guidelines for data usage, anonymize data before analysis","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Validation of the model with local data before applying it to different contexts, and collaboration with local experts and stakeholders for context-specific sharing","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting thorough environmental surveys, implementing standardized control measures, and promoting data-driven decision-making for environmental control","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting in-depth academic studies to fill the gap and provide accurate information for scholars and policymakers","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilization of ozone, ultraviolet irradiation, liquid chlorine, chlorine dioxide, and contaminated population)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Provide targeted economic aid to enhance compliance with stay-at-home measures","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Window ventilation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Refine the filtering process to include a broader range of public recreation resources; conduct sensitivity analysis to assess the impact of exclusion","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ai for testing
